Heh yeah I know it might but I was/am having a rough night and I jsut 
felt I needed to say that since well Dewboy was being a jerk and all 
to Yan. Who if I recall correctly was one of the people who stuck up 
for him originally when everyone was bashing him.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> Unfortunately, LN, that'll probably get you moderated. You had the 
> chance to say it privately...
> 
> 
> On 22 Jul 2001, at 2:58, Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
>

into

the

is he

Why

because

chars? Is

rule and

rockets up
